verses.roman:
sei bhāve prabhu sei śloka uccārilā
śloka uccārite tad-rūpa āpane ha-ilā

synonyms: sei bhāve—in that ecstatic mood; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sei—that; śloka—verse; uccārilā—recited; śloka—the verse; uccārite—by reciting; tat-rūpa—like Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; āpane—Himself; ha-ilā—became.
translation: In the same spirit of ecstasy, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu recited that verse, and as soon as He did so, He felt like Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī.
